animation_color_battery_to_house: color of the animation between battery and house (default: empty)
animation_color_grid_to_battery: color of the animation between grid and battery (default: empty)
animation_color_grid_to_house: color of the animation between grid and house (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_car: color of the animation between house and car (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom1: color of the animation between house and custom circle 1 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom2: color of the animation between house and custom circle 2 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom3: color of the animation between house and custom circle 3 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom4: color of the animation between house and custom circle 4 (default: empty)
animation_color_solar_to_battery: color of the animation between solar production and battery (default: empty)
animation_color_solar_to_grid: color of the animation between solar production and grid (default: empty)
animation_color_solar_to_house: color of the animation between solar production and house (default: empty)
animation_dots: Number of animation dots on the line
cb_battery_different: Use different states for Battery charge and discharge
cb_battery_reverse: Use negative for charging <u>and</u> positive for discharging
cb_grid_all_positive: Use positive for consumption <u>and</u> positive for grid feed in
cb_grid_different: Use different states for grid feeding and consumption
cb_grid_reverse: Use positive for consumption <u>and</u> negative for grid feed in
color_animation: color of the animation on the lines (default: #ffce4a)
color_battery: color of the circle around the battery (default: #a1d343)
color_battery_percent: color of the %-text inside the circle of the battery (default: #a1d343)
color_battery_text: color of the value inside the circle of the car (default: #a1d343)
color_battery_to_house: color of the line between battery and house (default: empty)
color_car: color of the circle around the car (default: #c5902e)
color_car_percent: color of the %-text inside the circle of the car (default: #c5902e)
color_car_plugged: color of the car icon if charger is connected (default: #a1d343)
color_car_text: color of the value inside the circle of the car (default: #c5902e)
color_custom: color of the circle around the custom circle (default: #f20e40)
color_custom_text: color of the value inside the custom circle (default: #f20e40)
color_grid: color of the circle around the grid feed (default: #61687a)
color_grid_text: color of the value inside the circle of the net feed-in (default: #61687a)
color_grid_to_battery: color of the line between grid and battery (default: empty)
color_grid_to_house: color of the line between grid and house (default: empty)
color_house: color of the circle around the house (default: #00b5dd)
color_house_text: color of the value inside the circle of the house (default: #00b5dd)
color_house_to_car: color of the line between house and car (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom1: color of the line between house and custom circle 1 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom2: color of the line between house and custom circle 2 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom3: color of the line between house and custom circle 3 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom4: color of the line between house and custom circle 4 (default: empty)
color_no_prod: color of the value if value is below threshold (default: empty)
color_production: color of the circle around the solar production (default: #ffce4a)
color_production_text: color of the value inside the circle of the solar production (default: #ffce4a)
color_solar_to_battery: color of the line between solar production and battery (default: empty)
color_solar_to_grid: color of the line between solar production and grid (default: empty)
color_solar_to_house: color of the line between solar production and house (default: empty)
ex_battery_charge:
Data point for charging your battery

(This is usually a negative and positive condition. If the state is different, please check the box and specify the other state on)
ex_battery_discharge: Data point for discharging your battery
ex_battery_percent: data point of your battery charge-level in %
ex_car_battery: Data point of your car accu in %
ex_car_charge: Data point of your charger or wallbox
ex_car_plugged: Data point car charger plugged in
ex_circle_label: color of the label inside the the circle (default: #000000)
ex_circle_shadow: color of the shadow around the circle (default: rgba(0, 0, 0, .7))
ex_circle_size: Thickness of the circle outline (in px)
ex_consumption: Data point of your house consumption
ex_custom: Data point of your custom circle
ex_custom_icon1:
How to get the Icon?
(Visit https://materialdesignicons.com and search for an icon.
ex_custom_icon2: Click the Icon and in the below row click '< / >', choose 'View SVG' and copy only the text inside d.
ex_custom_icon3: If you entered it correctly, it will replace the current question mark icon below.
ex_fraction: If zero, the value will be rounded to the next possible integer.
ex_grid_consumption: Data point of your grid consumption
ex_grid_feed:
Data point of your grid feeder

(This is usually a negative and positive condition. If the state is different, please check the box and specify the other state on)
ex_house_netto: Subtract the consumption of the car and additional equipment from the consumption in the house
ex_production: Data point of your photovoltaic production
ex_threshold:
a threshold over or under which values are handled.
10 for values greater than 10 or -10 Watts / or 0.01 for values greater than 0.01 or -0.01 kW.
This value affects the color too.
font-for-all: font-face for all elements - if URL specified on the right, define alias here (default: sans-serif)
font-src:
relative font url
Only (relative) paths from the same ip or address are allowed! (default: empty)
font_size_label: font-size of the description inside the circle (in px)
font_size_percent: font-size of the percent unit inside the circle (in px)
font_size_unit: font-size of the unit inside the circle (in px)
font_size_unit_percent: font-size of the percent unit inside the circle (in px)
font_size_value: font-size of the value inside the circle (in px)
fraction: Number of places after the decimal point for all values
fraction_battery: Number of places after the decimal point for the %-text
label: label
line_desc: Here you are able to modify each line and animation between the circles. Standard-color above will be overwritten!
recalculate: Calculate values from W in kW
